contents:
Be careful girl, and can you please also upload your video on lbry? because it's decentralized and anonymous, no one can censor it or use it to track you. Thanks for your video, mainlanders in China appreciate it.

Link to lbry:
https://lbry.tv/

Here is my post that introduce lbry on pincong:

https://pincong.rocks/article/12256
